rows.label: qev035102_MSG0001
rows.name: Enough, Earth alien![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0002
rows.name:
Leave rest to me. See what 10,000 suns of war
has taught Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0003
rows.name: Good... Good... Be calm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0004
rows.name:
Your master is Zarch Quokett now. Do not defy me,
or I will cause pain. You will pray for death.
But it will not come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0005
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0006
rows.name: Good. It is done. Odsent is truly mine now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0007
rows.name: Thank you. Now I will see my dream come true...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0008
rows.name: I will see all Cavern Clan dead by his fangs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0009
rows.name:
He is true to his name. He will carve open my future.
And their flesh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_JNK0010
rows.name: Verify

rows.label: qev035102_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Zarch if your work here is done.

rows.label: qev035102_JNK0020
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev035102_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Zarch that revenge only breeds more hate.

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yes. You did perfect job. But I have no money now.
I will give reward back in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0011
rows.name: I am headed back. You should hurry back as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you are slow, all Cavern Clan will be dead by time
you arrive. You might miss display of Odsent's strength![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0013
rows.name: What?! You would take side of Cavern Clan?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0014
rows.name:
They raided our settlement! Stole our people!
Slaughtered my mother like animal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0015
rows.name: And you would have me... Rrrrgh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035102_MSG0016
rows.name:
I will not forgive what they did. Or YOU, traitor!
Odsent! Kill this one! Rip flesh from [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] bones![ST:wait ]
